scene.name: intro
scene.line: Oh, we just use these to get around internally.

scene.name: size
scene.line: Oh, it's grown a great deal over the years. Incredible to think, really ...
When Mr. Bishop founded this operation, it was only about eighteen-hundred square feet, and half of that or more was occupied by camouflage to keep the law out.
Hiding out in the back of an old church purifying spirits by handmade fire. A kettle, and a dream.

scene.name: job
scene.line: Oh, I'm a copywriter. Text on bottles and flyers, ad copy, that sort of thing.
"Discerning shades and heartsick lovers have long known the taste of Hard Times, and held it in favor over all other spirits!" That was one of mine.

scene.name: to-trucks
scene.line: So. The trucks are just east a ways, in shipping. You can become acquainted with the dispatcher there.
Give me a tap on the shoulder, if you see something that catches your eye. Always happy to show off the facilities. Sublime machinery.
